text:
anybody has a working ingress configuration file for the utility-ui? This does not seem to work with rewrite.
```apiVersion: <http://networking.k8s.io/v1|networking.k8s.io/v1>
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  name: utility-ui-ingress
  namespace: validator
  annotations:
    <http://cert-manager.io/cluster-issuer|cert-manager.io/cluster-issuer>: lets-encrypt
    <http://nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/use-regex|nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/use-regex>: "true"
    <http://nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target|nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target>: /$2
spec:
  ingressClassName: public
  rules:
  - host: <http://utility.testdomain.com|utility.testdomain.com>
    http:
      paths:
      - path: /
        pathType: Prefix
        backend:
          service:
            name: utility-ui
            port:
              number: 8080
      - path: /api/validator/
        pathType: Prefix
        backend:
          service:
            name: validator-app
            port:
              number: 5003
      - path: /api/json-api(/|$)(.*)
        pathType: ImplementationSpecific
        backend:
          service:
            name: participant
            port:
              number: 7575
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - <http://utility.testdomain.com|utility.testdomain.com>
    secretName: cn-net-tls```

elements.text: anybody has a working ingress configuration file for the utility-ui? This does not seem to work with rewrite.

apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  name: utility-ui-ingress
  namespace: validator
  annotations:
    cert-manager.io/cluster-issuer: lets-encrypt
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/use-regex: "true"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /$2
spec:
  ingressClassName: public
  rules:
  - host: utility.testdomain.com
    http:
      paths:
      - path: /
        pathType: Prefix
        backend:
          service:
            name: utility-ui
            port:
              number: 8080
      - path: /api/validator/
        pathType: Prefix
        backend:
          service:
            name: validator-app
            port:
              number: 5003
      - path: /api/json-api(/|$)(.*)
        pathType: ImplementationSpecific
        backend:
          service:
            name: participant
            port:
              number: 7575
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - utility.testdomain.com
    secretName: cn-net-tls

text:
without the part below, i can access the ui over https but cannot use the *credentials* and *registry*
```    <http://nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/use-regex|nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/use-regex>: "true"
    <http://nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target|nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target>: /$2
and
      - path: /api/json-api(/|$)(.*)
        pathType: ImplementationSpecific
        backend:
          service:
            name: participant
            port:
              number: 7575```
